jobDescription: Enterprise Data Governance (EDGM) is a Corporate-wide initiative focused on the on-going governance of data in our Platforms. The EDGM Capabilities Team defines requirements and  design for on-going initiatives to support the Business users across the State Street enterprise including People, Process and Technology initiatives. The EDGM Capabilities team is looking for experienced people with skill sets that enable us to successfully deliver our many project objectives. The team works to define requirements and define/design enhancements for multiple Enterprise Platforms including KYC, MDM, Client Lifecycle, Data Governance and Enterprise Contract Management System (ECMS). This business/process analyst position will focus on defining and documenting enhancements for the ECMS enterprise platform.
